tags: None
review: Good. Clarity in explaining the process and procedure felt there was more transparency which showed high work ethics. The hygiene during the process was good. The pricing though on the higher side should be relooked for rationalization to benefit both. To summarise though visit to a Dentist gives me a chill down the spine would like to say the experience was good since they  being charming and smiling  relaxes you thus lowers and eases stress and anxiety.

tags: None
context: Implants(Fixed Teeth),Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
If you are scared of going to dentist...which normally everyone is...pls go to Dr. Shweta Vyas.

She did a great job with my teeth. Very caring, understands, listens and makes you take a call with everything.

Would highly highly recommend everyone to just pay her a visit and check for yourself.

tags: None
review: I have been a former patient with Synergy Dental Clinics. I have nothing but positive experience with them. The doctor and their supporting staff was extremely considerate and kept the patient at ease. The clinic is neat and clean with all the basic amenities in place. Would highly recommend to my friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dental Fillings,GIC Tooth Fillings,Surgical Tooth Extraction,RCT - Single Sitting,
review: Nice experience with Dr. Shweta Vyas, I would scale 10/10. I went for my wife and daughter and both are happy after the treatment by Doc. Thanks Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I took my mother for her regular check-up and the doctor treated her very well as she's afraid of Dentist's. But Dr. Shweta Vyas handled her very professionally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: She explained in detail about the tratment.*** *** *** ********* ********* *** would see that that she is comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Tooth Impaction Surgery,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),Tooth Extraction,
review:
It was very good and painless experience. I am very impressed with her working capabilities. 
I'll rate shweta 5/5.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went through root canal treatment that was done by Dr. shweta. She is amazing. I had very painful experience of RCT in past and due to that I was afraid and insisting dr to do treatment after anesthesia , however she was quite confident that there will be no pain and as she promised, it was painless rct treatment. 
Good work Doctor. Keep it up (y)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Shweta is very friendly and the treatment was done gently. Utmost care was taken about my age as I am a senior citizen during the treatment. Post treatment update and care is also taken by her. So far have done 2 root canals with her and both were without any pain.  I would strongly recommend her to all.
reply_text:
thank you so much !
we need your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is very polite with the patients and makes you feel comfortable. Very professional with the treatments and there is clarity in explaining the entire process. Very satisfactory experience and yeah hygiene is well maintained which is really important.. I would highly recommend to visit her.
